# linkai-aion

**linkai-aion** is a lightweight Python utility library created by [LinkAI](https://linkaiapps.com), built to help developers simplify everyday tasks involving **text processing**, **file I/O**, **CLI parsing**, and more.

It's designed for developers who want clean, reusable functions to speed up their workflow â€” and it's just the beginning. Future versions will introduce AI features built on top of this solid foundation.
